entry.title: nirmalcodes/auth-api-express-mongo: A lightweight and modular authentication API built with Express.js and MongoDB. It supports user registration, login, and JWT-based authentication with secure password hashing. Designed with a clean, scalable folder structure for easy integration into larger projects.
entry.content: A lightweight and modular authentication API built with Express.js and MongoDB. It supports user registration, login, and JWT-based authentication with secure password hashing. Designed with a clean, scalable folder structure for easy integration into larger projects.

entry.title: prakhardubey2002/Preact-Missing-Hooks: A lightweight, extendable collection of missing React-like hooks for Preact — plus fresh, powerful new ones designed specifically for modern Preact apps.
entry.content: A lightweight, extendable collection of missing React-like hooks for Preact — plus fresh, powerful new ones designed specifically for modern Preact apps.

entry.title: zeevarblocks/bitcoin-signal-analyzer: Bitcoin Signal Analyzer — A lightweight Next.js app that visualizes Bitcoin trends using ATH, ATL, and EMA70 on the 1W chart. Powered by CoinGecko API, it generates basic bullish/bearish signals for traders, with support for email alerts, ads, and affiliate monetization.
entry.content: Bitcoin Signal Analyzer — A lightweight Next.js app that visualizes Bitcoin trends using ATH, ATL, and EMA70 on the 1W chart. Powered by CoinGecko API, it generates basic bullish/bearish signals for traders, with support for email alerts, ads, and affiliate monetization.

entry.title: SeloSlav/vibe-coding-starter-pack-2d-multiplayer-survival: A lightweight 2D open-world survival game starter kit using React, Vite, and SpacetimeDB.
